mapper.sql: SELECT o.*, g.id AS g_id, g.price AS g_price, g.NAME AS g_name, g.goods_url AS g_url, og.num AS g_num FROM orderinfo AS o LEFT JOIN ordergoods AS og ON o.id = og.order_id LEFT JOIN goodsinfo AS g ON og.goods_id = g.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderinfo(id, carriage_id, carriage_url, carrier, date, price, receiver_address, receiver_name, receiver_phone, order_url, status, uid, pay_way, platform, settle_time, settlement_price) VALUES (#{id}, #{carriageId}, #{carriageUrl}, #{carrier}, #{date}, #{price}, #{receiverAddress}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{orderUrl}, #{status}, #{uid}, #{payWay}, #{platform}, #{settleTime}, #{settlementPrice})
mapper.update: UPDATE orderinfo SET carriage_id = #{carriageId}, carriage_url= #{carriageUrl}, carrier= #{carrier}, date= #{date}, price= #{price}, receiver_address= #{receiverAddress}, receiver_name= #{receiverName}, receiver_phone= #{receiverPhone}, order_url= #{orderUrl}, status= #{status}, uid= #{uid}, pay_way= #{payWay}, platform= #{platform}, settle_time= #{settleTime}, settlement_price= #{settlementPrice} WHERE id = #{id}
